channel.title: reidlewis tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from reidlewis.

item.description: PSA The mission of the Himalayan Otter Network is to foster a partnership connecting conservationists and researchers across the Himalayan region in order to strengthen the protection of otters living in the rivers and wetlands of this spectacular landscape. #OttersOfHimalayas https://t.co/eFJubqd2yb https://t.co/4Xr4JaU8fG

@julia_bergeron @NASASpaceflight Thanks as always @julia_bergeron for your excellent portraits of the rarest of all species, the #Octagrabber, in their native habit! If I'm correct, they only emerge from their lairs in dying flames of #merlin engines. The #humanforscale highlights the size of these beasties!
Drivers, stay clear of this area! #bethesda [link] From a neighbor who is on the scene: River Rd is closed, the fire is out and the authorities are investigating #bethesda little falls parkway [link]
